meanings.definition: A diagnostic procedure used to visualize the lymphatic vessels.
meanings.sent1: The lymphangiogram helped the doctor see the tubes that carry fluid in my body.
meanings.sent2: The hospital stored the lymphangiogram images for future reference.
meanings.sent3: During the lymphangiogram, I felt like a detective investigating my own body's secrets.
meanings.sent4: The lymphangiogram was like a map of hidden rivers flowing beneath my skin.
meanings.sent5: The lymphangiogram revealed a network of tiny roads inside me, like a microscopic city.

meanings.definition: The resulting image or record produced by a lymphangiogram.
meanings.sent1: The doctor showed me the lymphangiogram of my lymphatic system.
meanings.sent2: The lymphangiogram displayed a detailed picture of the vessels.
meanings.sent3: I framed the lymphangiogram on my wall as a quirky piece of art.
meanings.sent4: The lymphangiogram looked like a mysterious blueprint of my inner workings.
meanings.sent5: The lymphangiogram was a snapshot of the hidden pathways within me.
